mapper.select:
select Project_ID,Project_Name, Min_Amount ,Max_Amount, Min_Rate ,Max_Rate, Single_Min, Invest_Max, MinStart ,Brief_Introduction, Apply_Member, Pic_Url, Pic_Icon ,Is_Mortgage, Statu from ProjectBaseInfo

mapper.insert: insert into ProjectBaseInfo (Project_ID,Project_Name, Min_Amount ,Max_Amount, Min_Rate ,Max_Rate, Single_Min, Invest_Max, MinStart ,Brief_Introduction, Apply_Member, Pic_Url, Pic_Icon ,Is_Mortgage ) values (#{id},#{projectName},#{minAmount},#{maxAmount},#{minRate},#{maxRate},#{singleMin},#{investMax},#{minStart},#{briefIntroduction} ,#{applyMember},#{picUrl},#{picIcon},#{isMortgage})
mapper.select: select Project_ID,Project_Name from ProjectBaseInfo where Project_Name=#{projectName} and Project_ID!=#{id}

Min_Rate=#{minRate},
